page.title: 04RELIGION CONTINUED
page.content: of{Baptism} performed in the {Church but parents were still fighting against this, and preferred this service should be performed in their own homes. {Church weddings} were still a rarity and {weddings }were mostly performed in the {Bride's}home or in the {Manse,}athough some were being performed in{hotels} with family and friends gathering afterwards and with a meal provided.There was an old custom of firing {2 }shots from a { {shootgun}over a {bridegroom's head }as he was on his way to be {wed.} {SUNDAY SCHOOL} The official name is {Ardoch Church {Sunday School.}It is to learn about the {Word of GOD.}The teachers are{ {Mrs.A.Finlayson }and{Mrs. G.Methven} are in charge of the little ones and {Mrs.G.Johnstone and.Mrs. S.Dawson }are in charge of the big ones.
